TEXT.TITLE: CITIZENS FIDELITY <CFDY> PAPER UPGRADED BY S/P
TEXT.BODY: Standard and Poor's Corp said it raised to A-1-plus from A-1 the commercial paper of Citizens Fidelity Corp and its unit Citizens Fidelity Bank and Trust. S and P cited the completion of the firm's merger with PNC Financial Corp <PNCF>, saying PNC has shown solid earnings, excellent liquidity and a conservative capital position. The rating agency also upgraded long-term debt supported by letters of credit of lead bank Citizens Fidelity Bank to AA-plus from A. The bank's certificates of deposit were upped to AA-plus and A-1-plus from A and A-1 respectively. Reuter
